Book_1: book_description: An in-depth look at creating applications with XML.
Book_2: book_description: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.
Book_3: book_description: After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.
Book_4: book_description: In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve Ascendant.
Book_5: book_description: The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, battle one another for control of England. Sequel to Oberon's Legacy.
Book_6: book_description: When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology conference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.
Book_7: book_description: A deep sea diver finds true love twenty thousand leagues beneath the sea.
Book_8: book_description: An anthology of horror stories about roaches, centipedes, scorpions  and other insects.
Book_9: book_description: After an inadvertant trip through a Heisenberg Uncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problems of being quantum.
Book_10: book_description: Microsoft's .NET initiative is explored in detail in this deep programmer's reference.
Book_11: book_description: The Microsoft MSXML3 parser is covered in detail, with attention to XML DOM interfaces, XSLT processing, SAX and more.
Book_12: book_title: Visual Studio 7: A Comprehensive Guide
book_description: Microsoft Visual Studio 7 is explored in depth, looking at how Visual Basic, Visual C++, C#, and ASP+ are integrated into a comprehensive development environment.
